Journal: Journal Of Behavior Therapy And Experimental Psychiatry
Title: Playing the computer game tetris prior to viewing traumatic film material and subsequent intrusive memories: examining proactive interference
Author: James, Ella L.; Lau-Zhu, Alex; Tickle, Hannah; Horsch, Antje; Holmes, Emily A.
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of lab intrusions.

Title: The impact of perceived self-efficacy on memory for aversive experiences
Author: Brown, Adam D.; Joscelyne, Amy; Dorfman, Michelle L.; Marmar, Charles R.; Bryant, Richard A.
ResultSummary: Individuals in the HSE condition had significantly fewer visual intrusions than individuals in the LSE condition, immediately after the film
Notes_fromMo: This paper reported film-related distress, does it count as intrusion-related distress?

Journal: Journal Of Behavior Therapy And Experimental Psychiatry
Title: Can an experimental self-efficacy induction through autobiographical recall modulate analogue posttraumatic intrusions?
Author: Krans, Julie; Brown, Adam D.; Moulds, Michelle L.
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of intrusion frequency
Notes_fromMo: Is the control task a no-task control or experimental task

Title: Reducing depressive intrusions via a computerized cognitive bias modification of appraisals task: developing a cognitive vaccine
Author: Lang, Tamara J.; Moulds, Michelle L.; Holmes, Emily A.
ResultSummary: There was no difference between conditions for combined intrusions during provocation task

Title: Reducing depressive intrusions via a computerized cognitive bias modification of appraisals task: developing a cognitive vaccine
